headline: Is AU Poised for Another Robust Y/Y Adjusted EBITDA Increase?
summary: AngloGold Ashanti's adjusted EBITDA jumped 121% y/y in the first nine months of 2025, fueled by higher output, cost discipline and strong gold prices.

headline: Newmont (NEM) Climbs to All-Time High Amid Strong Gold Momentum
summary: With a low forward price-to-earnings multiple and significant hedge fund interest, Newmont Corporation (NYSE:NEM) secures a spot on our list of the 12 cheap gold stocks to buy now. Newmont Corporation (NYSE:NEM), one of the world’s two largest gold producers, alongside Barrick, reached its all-time high of $102.13 on December 12, 2025, before closing at […]

headline: Barrick Mining (B) Trades Near Its 52-Week Amid Strong Share Price Surge in 2025
summary: Barrick Mining Corporation (NYSE:B) is one of the 12 cheap gold stocks to buy now. On December 12, 2025, Barrick Mining Corporation (NYSE:B), one of the two largest gold producers, alongside Newmont Corporation, surged to its new 52-week high of $44.07 before closing at $43.09.
